name: Die a hero (ChipmunkGames, squizout)
description:
A submission for the Screamorality 2021 game jam.

You have been tasked with shutting down a faulty nuclear reactor. The system is controlled by 4 keypads within the facility, but none of the surviving scientists know the locations of the codes. Find them, activate the keypads, and shutdown the reactor.

WARNING: The radiation threat is critical and has caused unknown mutations in the now radioactive plant employees. Keep an eye on the effect of increasing radiation, as the impact is unknown.

Controls:

WASD - movement

Mouse - look

Left click - attack

Right click - interact

Esc - pause

Install instructions
  1. Download the zip file
  2. Extract it (right click -> extract all)
  3. Open the folder
  4. Launch Die a her0
